apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: test-fake-db-creds
  namespace: production
type: Opaque
data:
  # base64("FAKE-db-pass")
  DB_PASSWORD: RkFLRS1kYi1wYXNz
  # base64("FAKE-db-user")
  DB_USER: RkFLRS1kYi11c2Vy
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: app-config
  namespace: production
data:
  APP_ENV: production
  LOG_LEVEL: info
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: test-fake-tls-cert
  namespace: production
type: kubernetes.io/tls
data:
  # base64("FAKE-tls-cert-data")
  tls.crt: RkFLRS10bHMtY2VydC1kYXRh
  # base64("FAKE-tls-key-data")
  tls.key: RkFLRS10bHMta2V5LWRhdGE=
